title: OPPO F19 (Space Silver, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, Earphones, USB Data Cable, SIM Ejector Tool, Protective Case, Warranty Card, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dirac Sound Effect, Single-MIC Noise Cancellation
product_specification.Other Display Features: 60 Hz Refresh Rate, Touch Sampling Rate: 135 Hz (Normal), 180 Hz (Gaming), Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90.8%, Color Saturation: 95.82% NTSC (Typ), 20:9 Aspect Ratio, Color Gamut: 92% DCI-P3 (Typ), 100% sRGB (Typ), 1000000:1 Contrast Ratio, Oleophobic Coating, Night Mode, Eye Comfort, SCHOTT X-UP Front Screen Protection Glass
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 48MP Main + 2MP Depth + 2MP Macro: 48MP (OV OV48B, 1/2 Inch Lens, Pixel Size: 0.8 um, 4:3, f/1.7 Aperture, FOV 79 Degree, 6P Lens, PDAF, Focal Length: 4.71 mm), 2MP Depth (GalaxyCore GC02M1B, 1/5 Inch Lens, Pixel Size: 1.75 um, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV 89 Degree, 3P Lens, FF, 4:3, Focal Length: 1.77 mm), 2MP Macro (OV OV02B10, 1/5 Inch Lens, Pixel Size: 1.75 um, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV 89 Degree, 3P Lens, FF, 4:3, Focal Length: 1.77 mm), CMOS Sensor, Camera Mode: Photo, Video, Night, Expert, Panorama, Portrait, Time-lapse, Slow-motion, Text Scanner, and Google Lens, Photo Editing Options: Filter, Auto Enhance, Crop and Rotate, Stickers, Doodle, Beautify, Text, Mosaic, Blur, and Eraser
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Front Camera (Sony IMX 471, Lens Size: 1/3.09 inch, 1 um Pixel Size, f/2.4 Aperture, Focal length: 3.48 mm, FOV 78 Degree, 4:3 Aspect Ratio, 5P Lens, FF), CMOS Sensor, Camera Mode: Photo, Video, Panorama, Portrait, Night, Time-lapse, Selfie Beautification
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080P/720P (at 30fps), Video Slo-mo: 720P (at 120fps), Front Camera: 1080P/720P (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Geomagnetic Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Optical Sensor, Accelerometer, Gravity Sensor, Gyroscope, Pedometer
product_specification.Other Features: 33W Flash Charge, OTG Storage Format: FAT32, NTFS and exFAT, 2TB Maximum OTG Storage Supported, Private Safe (File Lock), App Lock, App Lock Method: Pattern, PIN, Alphanumeric Password, Fingerprint, and Face, Fingerprint Unlock Time (557 ms), Face Unlock Time (854 ms), Fast Charging: Super VOOC 2.0, Super VOOC, VOOC 2.0/3.0/4.0, IPX4 Rated Ingress Protection, Step Counting, In-display Fingerprint Sensor
product_specification.Video Formats: AVI, 3GP, MP4, WMV, MKV, MOV, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: Brand Warranty of 1 Year Available for Mobile Including Battery and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.33 W Flash Charge: Thanks to the 33 W Flash Charge feature, you do not have to sleep next to a plug point to fully charge the OPPO F19.
product_description.Charges Quickly: The 5000 mAh battery ensures that you do not have to carry your charger everywhere. Also, the 33 W Flash Charge boosts the battery life up to 54% in about just 30 minutes of charge. To prevent overcharging while you sleep, this smartphone also comes with an AI Night Charge feature that pauses the battery at 80% and then charges to 100% right before you wake up.
product_description.Immersive Viewing Experience: This smartphone has an AMOLED FHD+ punch-hole display featuring a high screen-to-body ratio for an immersive viewing experience. Also, it is an eye-caring screen that adapts continuously to a level that is comfortable for your eyes.
product_description.Display Details: This smartphone comes with a 16.34-cm display with 2400 x 1080 (FHD+) resolution. The screen-to-body ratio is 90.8%, and the pixel density is 409 PPI. Also, the 1.60-mm border-width offers distraction-free visuals, and the 600 nits of peak brightness ensure that the visuals are vibrant and impressive.
product_description.Power on Your Fingertips: This smartphone comes with an In-display Fingerprint Unlock to unlock this device quickly and easily. It accurately scans your fingerprint without wasting time to unlock this device.
product_description.Stylish and Lightweight: This is a lightweight smartphone with a sleek 3D-curved body that looks stunning.
product_description.Striking Hues: This smartphone is available in eye-catching Midnight Blue and Prism Black shades.
product_description.Cameras to Capture Stunning Photos: This smartphone comes with three cameras to improve your photography skills.
product_description.48 MP Main Camera: Precision, clarity, and impressive details - this camera ensures that your photos capture the true beauty of your surroundings.
product_description.2 MP Depth Camera: Add a mind-blowing bokeh effect to your portrait shots with the 2 MP Depth Camera of this OPPO F19.
product_description.2 MP Macro Camera: This camera unveils and captures the tiny details of subjects and lets you capture photos with an impressive micro perspective.
product_description.AI Beautification Selfie Camera: The customised AI beautification effect captures your true beauty in every selfie.
product_description.Powerful and Fast: For a smooth and impressive performance, this smartphone runs on 6 GB of RAM, 128 GB of ROM, and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 processor.
product_description.ColorOS 11.1 OS: The ColorOS 11.1 OS offers a wide range of user-friendly features including App Lock to ensure that your privacy can be maintained easily. It also has a Private Safe Cloud Sync feature using which you can easily access your personal files that are stored in the Private Safe via this smartphone. Thus, your personal files are safe and easy to access. It also has an All-scenario SOS facility. So, by tapping on the power button multiple times, you can access a wide range of emergency features on this smartphone.

pros.Build Quality: This phone is lightweight and slim. It has a sturdy build and a stunning look and design.

cons.16.34-cm display with 2400 x 1080 (FHD+): The FHD+ display is of average quality and not upto the mark.
cons.Camera: The triple rear camera setup and 16MP front camera quality is average and doesn't perform well.

summary.verdict: The OPPO F19 is a decent pick in this price segment.
summary.Additional Information: 4g sim support, Gorilla glass 5, Type-c port.
